import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './calculator.css'; export default function Calculator(props){ const [output, setOutput] = React.useState(''); function calculate(){ } const AppStyle = { visibility : props.visibility ? "visible" : "hidden", } console.log(props.visibility) function minimise(){ console.log("mini") props.toggle() } function close(){ props.close() } return(
Calculator

{output}

) }
